title: 局域网联机怎么关闭队友伤害
author: F0RTUNE
txt_content:
版本是1.16.1，用的**局域网联机。使用计分板命令时发现没法创建队伍，没有teams选项




image.png (87.05 KB, 下载次数: 0)

下载附件

2020-8-10 20:48 上传

replies.author: 阴阳师元素祭祀
replies.txt_content:
直接用
/team
/team ......

/team add <team> [<displayName>]
/team modify <team> friendlyFire <value>
/team join <team> [<members>]

replies.author: 炫宙菌
replies.txt_content:
1.13+扁平化后记分板变了 team被剥离出来了
/team add Red 红队
/team modify Red friendlyfire true
/team join Red 玩家ID
